query:
ALTER TABLE leads 
ADD COLUMN convertedToOpportunity ENUM('Yes', 'No') DEFAULT 'No' NOT NULL,
ADD COLUMN opportunityId INT,
ADD COLUMN conversionDate TIMESTAMP;
